traits.Blood Frenzy: The champion has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.
traits.Limited Amphibiousness: The champion can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.
traits.Shark Telepathy: The champion can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.
